competitors.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
competitors.notes: Leading cloud infrastructure provider, formidable rival in PaaS and IaaS

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Competitor in Azure cloud, enterprise software, and AI solutions

competitors.name: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
competitors.notes: Major competitor in cloud computing and AI

competitors.name: Oracle Cloud
competitors.notes: Competitor in cloud infrastructure and enterprise software

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Leading IT consulting competitor with partnerships with Microsoft, Oracle, and SAP

competitors.name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
competitors.notes: Major IT services and transformation competitor

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise infrastructure and services

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks
competitors.notes: Cybersecurity competitor; May 2024 partnership where IBM Consulting became main firm for implementing Palo Alto platforms

competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Enterprise software and AI solutions competitor

competitors.name: Adobe
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise software and AI solutions

context: In 2024, IBM's competitive landscape spans cloud computing, enterprise software and AI, hardware, IT consulting, and cybersecurity. A significant development was the May 2024 partnership with Palo Alto Networks, where IBM Consulting became the primary firm for implementing Palo Alto's cybersecurity platforms.
